S.FORM: alang Gowryu ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Nahuy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 53 buwan, 156 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 52 kyan ku 81 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 48 kyan ku 75 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 47 , Amis 3 , Paywan 2 . maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Gowryu hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Gowryu hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Gowryu hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Gowryu hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Gowryu hya' ga Pololan. tay 'llaw na Gowryu hya' ga Mkslaq. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
